ssot__SurveyQuestionResponse__dlm.name: Survey Question Response
ssot__SurveyQuestionResponse__dlm.description: The Survey Question Response DMO represents a participant's answer to a specific question.

ssot__BooleanValue__c.description: The response value for a boolean question.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__DataType__c.description: The data type of the survey question response.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the survey question response.

ssot__Last ModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the survey question response.

ssot__NumberValue__c.description: The response value for a numeric question.

ssot__RankNumber__c.description: The rank value of the survey response question.

ssot__ResponseValue__c.description: The response value for a text question.

ssot__SurveyQuestionId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey question for the response.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the survey question response DMO.

ssot__SurveyResponseId__c.description: A reference ID to the survey response for the question.
